name: .YFT
summary: Learn about .YFT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a YFT file with OpenIV (Windows). Doing so allows you to view the model the YFT file contains. You can also open a YFT file with Zanoza ZModeler (Windows), using the GTA V Import/Export filter. Doing so allows you to edit and convert the model the YFT file contains.
You can use Zanoza ZModeler (Windows) to convert YFT files to the following 3D model formats, as well as several other game-specific formats:
